vote.title: Appointment of Member to the School Construction Bond Citizens’ Oversight Committee  (Sup Res 002-21/22)
vote.description: Resolved, That the Governing Board of the Los Angeles Unified School District ratifies the appointment of Ms. Laura Baz, and Ms. Samantha Rowles as an alternate, LAUSD parent representative of a child enrolled in the District and active in a parent-teacher organization (Section 3.1.5 of MOU), as Member to the School Construction Bond Citizens’ Oversight Committee for a two-year term commencing immediately, and determines that Ms. Baz and Ms. Rowles are not employees, officials, vendors, contractors, or consultants of the District.
